rules_text:
Trample
Devour 3
When Toutetsu enters, create a Blood token for each creature it devoured.
{B}, Sacrifice a Blood token: Toutetsu gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
{U}, Sacrifice a Blood token: Draw a card.
